snippet: Thierry Henry's return to Arsenal, and Paul Scholes's return to Manchester United a day earlier, were two very different experiences, for teams with two very different sets of needs.
abstract: Thierry Henry's return to Arsenal, and Paul Scholes's return to Manchester United a day earlier, were two very different experiences, for teams with two very different sets of needs.

headline.main: Returns of Henry and Scholes Show Pull of Premier League
